docs.lead_paragraph: Wouldn’t it have been kind of a pleasant dream world, in these overheated last few weeks, to have lived free of social media?

docs.abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column, responding to unlikely proposals by Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton, imagines fantasy world in which it was possible to turn off all or part of the Internet; holds it would have been pleasant to be cut off from social media during absurd and outrageous news events of recent weeks.
